name: Garlic Chipotle Guacamole Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: avocado, garlic, medium roma tomato, chipotle pepper in adobo sauce, lime, salt, pepper, tortilla chips
recipeIngredient: 1 medium Roma tomato, seeded and diced
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, combine the avocado, roasted garlic, tomato, chipotle peppers, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together until fully incorporated.
